member.name: MIB_UDP6ROW_OWNER_MODULE
member.summary: The MIB_UDP6ROW_OWNER_MODULE structure contains an entry from the User Datagram Protocol (UDP) listener table for IPv6 on the local computer. This entry also includes any available ownership data and the process ID (PID) that issued the call to the function for the UDP endpoint.

summary.para: The IPv6 address of the UDP endpoint on the local computer. This member is stored in a character array in network byte order.
A value of zero indicates a UDP listener willing to accept datagrams for any IP interface associated with the local computer.

member.name: MIB_UDP6ROW_OWNER_MODULE.dwLocalScopeId
member.summary: The scope ID for the IPv6 address of the UDP endpoint on the local computer.

member.name: MIB_UDP6ROW_OWNER_MODULE.dwLocalPort
member.summary: The port number for the local UDP endpoint.

member.name: MIB_UDP6ROW_OWNER_MODULE.dwOwningPid
member.summary: The PID of the process that issued a context bind for this endpoint. If this value is set to 0, the information for this endpoint is unavailable.

member.name: MIB_UDP6ROW_OWNER_MODULE.liCreateTimestamp
member.summary: A structure that indicates when the context bind operation that created this endpoint occurred.

member.name: MIB_UDP6ROW_OWNER_MODULE.SpecificPortBind
member.summary: A value that indicates if a specific port was specified in the last context bind operation.

member.name: MIB_UDP6ROW_OWNER_MODULE.dwFlags
member.summary: A set of flags. This member is not currently used.

member.name: MIB_UDP6ROW_OWNER_MODULE.OwningModuleInfo
member.summary: An array of opaque data that contains ownership information.
